name: Homicidal-Human
description: OK, so this is my first WAD, & it grewed so the theme is only that its best to shoot from cover wherever possible ;-) A variety of rooms and plenty of beasties in convenient GULP sized packets. Ammo IS adequate, so it can be done in UV, honest Guv. (I'm a ten Guv-a-day man, always have been, always will be)
